alert.note: Alert for Riverside (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 16 at 1:39PM PDT until March 17 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Hydrologic flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of Southwest California, including the following county, Riverside. * WHEN...Until 700 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Flow in the Whitewater River could result in low-water crossings near the river becoming impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 139 PM PDT, Heavy rainfall has occurred in the San Bernardino County mountains, and water is flowing off the mountains and into the Whitewater River. The river will continue to have flow into this evening. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Southern Indio, eastern Palm Springs, Coachella, Cathedral City, Palm Desert, Rancho Mirage, Thermal, La Quinta, Mecca and Indian Wells. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
